mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STORE_ORDER (ORDER_ID, P_ID, MEMBER_SERIAL, AMOUNT, TOTALSUM, P_NAME, MEMO,ORDER_DATE, ORDER_STATUS, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL, ZIP, ORDER_POINT, PHONE, S_IMAGE) VALUES (ORDER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{p_id}, #{member_serial}, #{amount}, #{totalSum}, #{p_name}, #{memo}, SYSDATE,#{order_status}, #{address}, #{address_detail}, #{zip}, #{order_point}, #{phone}, ${s_image})
mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_ID, O.P_ID, O.MEMBER_SERIAL, O.AMOUNT, O.TOTALSUM, O.MEMO, O.ORDER_DATE, O.P_NAME, O.ORDER_STATUS, O.ADDRESS, O.ADDRESS_DETAIL, O.ZIP, O.ORDER_POINT, O.PHONE, U.REALNAME FROM STORE_ORDER O, USER_DETAIL U WHERE O.MEMBER_SERIAL = U.MEMBER_SERIAL AND O.MEMBER_SERIAL = #{member_serial} ORDER BY ORDER_ID DESC

SELECT O.ORDER_ID, O.P_ID, O.MEMBER_SERIAL, O.AMOUNT, O.TOTALSUM, O.MEMO, O.ORDER_DATE, O.P_NAME, O.ORDER_STATUS, O.ADDRESS, O.ADDRESS_DETAIL, O.ZIP, O.ORDER_POINT, O.PHONE, U.REALNAME FROM STORE_ORDER O, USER_DETAIL U WHERE O.MEMBER_SERIAL = U.MEMBER_SERIAL AND O.ORDER_ID = #{order_id}
